boston Mayor Martin J PERIOD Walsh WCAS  hopes to make the city a municipal arts leader through the creation of a sustainable cultural plan an increase in performance and work spaces and support for a range of arts and cultural traditions that come with the rich diversity of Bostons population PERIOD
